line_1: But that once lost, towards St. James's veer;
line_2: By You, my Polar Star, awhile I steer,

line_1: Till Fate allows no time to veer.
line_2: Point out the course it ought to steer;

line_1: To whate'er point the breeze inconstant veer,
line_2: Still doth thy careless helmsman onward steer;
